  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:aspect.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_f9cb0b68e995eee28811d1a9751de2a67cd8ae0d</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_f9cb0b68e995eee28811d1a9751de2a67cd8ae0d</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Domain walls</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gebiet Wände</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Murs de domaine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Paredes do domínio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Pareti di settore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τοίχοι δικτυακών γειτονιών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Paredes del dominio</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the magnetisation and domain walls at different points in a hysteresis loop. This can be used as an exercise to study magnetic hysteresis.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hysteresis loop</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic hysteresis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetisation</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung stellt dar, daß die 
Magnetisierung und Gebiet Wände an den unterschiedlichen Punkten in 
einer Hysterese sich schlingen. Dieses kann als Übung verwendet
werden, um magnetische Hysterese zu studieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre que les murs de 
magnétisation et de domaine à différents points dans une 
hystérésis font une boucle. Ceci peut être employé comme 
exercice pour étudier l'hystérésis magnétique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que as paredes da 
magnetização e do domínio em pontos diferentes em uma histerese 
dão laços. Isto pode ser usado como um exercício estudar a 
histerese magnética.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra che le pareti di 
settore e di magnetizzazione ai punti differenti in un'isteresi 
collegano. Ciò può essere usata come esercitazione per 
studiare l'isteresi magnetica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τοίχους μαγνήτισης και 
δικτυακών γειτονιών στα διαφορετικά σημεία σε έναν βρόχο 
υστέρησης. Αυτό μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί ως άσκηση στη 
μαγνητική υστέρηση μελέτης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que las paredes de la 
magnetización y del dominio en diversas puntas en una histéresis 
colocan. Esto se puede utilizar como ejercicio para estudiar 
histéresis magnética.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hystereseschleife</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetische Hysterese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Magnetisierung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">boucle d'hystérésis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">hystérésis magnétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">magnétisation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">laço da histerese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">histerese magnética</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">magnetização</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ciclo di isteresi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">isteresi magnetica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">magnetizzazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βρόχος υστέρησης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μαγνητική υστέρηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μαγνήτιση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">bucle de la histéresis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">histéresis magnética</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">magnetización</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
